name: Space Mice
description:
STORY:

The Space Mice go on an adventure of a lifetime! When Red and Blue get hit by a meteor they must adapt to life on earth.  But an evil villain is here to go ruin the fun! It's up to Blue and Red to save the world from destruction!

PLAY THE GAME EVERYWHERE!

This game is available to play A N Y W H E R E  ! 

  • Gamejolt link: https://gamejolt.com/games/SpaceMice/584535
  • Scratch link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/379697626/
